name: Shoot'em (Robyn Behan)
description:
Shoot'em is a two player western shooter developed by Robyn Behan and Eoin Ahern. The game was developed for a college assignment. This game is inspired by the Atari 2600 game Outlaw.

All music and sound assets used in this project were sourced from www.bensound.com and https://www.freesound.org and is used under a Creative Commons License.
